professional.title: SpectraKey
professional.content: SpectraKey is a small creative media team crafting products for the web and video platforms. My current position involves:

professional.title: BSc (Hons) Music Technology - 1st
professional.content:
I undertook a major technology project to design and build an interactive performace controller for electric guitarists.

The aim was to enable guitarists to interact with their instrument’s sound in unique and intuitive ways. Also challenging the inflexibities in traditional guitar systems that offer limited real-time control of effects processing.

University Prize Winner

interests.title: Explorer
interests.content: I love the outdoors. There’s nothing better than slipping on the walking boots and venturing into the english countryside; discovering hidden landscapes and gathering inspiration with my camera. When I’m feeling a little more adventurous I can be found climbing up cliff-faces.

interests.title: Music
interests.content: I’ve played guitar from an early age. I enjoy getting invloved in live music events. Currently I help run Discovery2’s emerging talent showcase.
